body:
Comment 1: 
I assume you are using cgo.  Is goMarshal marked with an //export line?  If so the call
back to goMarshal should switch to a Go stack before running it.  I'm not sure how you
are invoking goMarshal such that it is running on a C stack.
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**, **release-go1.4**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
